alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Meeker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 3:26AM CDT until July 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Meeker County in central Minnesota... Central Kandiyohi County in central Minnesota... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 326 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Spicer, or 8 miles north of Willmar, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Willmar and New London around 335 AM CDT. Spicer around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Atwater and Grove City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
